Articles.Content:
Good to see there is no loopholes to close up.

On topic : They try and make an eternal life potion and destroy 1/20th of their population.

the planet was a gas giant called Arin and has 2 moons,Stov and Mul

Mul was a lava planet and is about the size of titan,due to gravitational friction Stov and Arin made

Stov was a Earth-like Planet and was a bit more bigger then ganymede

Arin:

Stov:

Edited January 30, 2014 by Jupiter02

But one smart Derp finds out that it can be used for traveling to other dimensions. However, all the Derps (except 5) get sucked into a parallel universe. Meanwhile the flying Derps create large floating cities in the skies...
don't do it alemagno12. thread necromancy is illegal
a thing everyone should make a try at, so what we have, the starmade pals', the space engi pals', the squad pals', the reus pals', a few other pals' ... also' .... just do it ; )
Then the Lost Derps (who have turned into cosmic beings of great power) decide that the Derp Race is unworthy and implodes their universe and creates our universe and time has caught up with us now.

Despite the startling evolutionary path of these derps, A large comet enters the atmosphere. The Ice boils off and makes the atmosphere denser, and debris rain down upon the planet. Eventually, what wasn't killed by the debris is wiped out by the sudden change in atmospheric density.

On 1/6/2014 at 8:32 AM, Sesni said:
On 1/6/2014 at 10:29 PM, Galacticruler said:

Simple organisms that survived are surviving the snowball world have began to produce glycols and other anti-freeze protiens and are now forming colonies within the ice.

You should start a poll for the planet name :/

(I suggest Dal Nalten for the name)

Boskone!
